title: Acceleration of T 2* mapping on an MR Linac using a self-supervised convolutional neural network.
details: A Ugwudike, Z Zhang, W Bano, A Tree, W Luk…
abstract: Approach: We developed a physics-informed self-supervised convolutional neural network for whole volume T 2* mapping of complex multi-echo data from an MR Linac. Bias in T 2* estimation is accounted for by calculating the additional signal …
